item.title: Reveal.js CLI
item.description: Ever since I wrote about VSCode Reveal, I wanted to have a command-line interface to generate the same output. I loved that well-configured behavior and did not want to start from scratch. Finally, I had the time to do it.

item.title: Markdown Slideshow
item.description: Today I’ve found an awesome library, called reveal.js, that lets me create slideshows in markdown format. It has a VSCode plugin, that is intuitive to use. My main purpose was to create a slideshow in plaintext format, and this lib exceeded my hopes.

item.title: Plaintext Docs In Markdown
item.description: Markdown makes it easy to write formatted text quickly. It’s a plain text format that uses basic notations to add semantics to the document. The format is widely adopted, it is a very simple and efficient tool in the hands of a developer.
